- Weslaco City Commission Workshop/ Weslaco City Commission Meeting
go to calendar
  • CityÂ Commission
The Commission is comprised of two Commissioners At-Large and four single-member districts in Weslaco. Commissioner is elected to a four year term. The City Commission appoints the Mayor Pro-Tem who serves in the absence of the Mayor.


Mayor Pro Tem
Pete Garcia Jr.
At-Large
Email: pete.garcia@weslacotx.gov



Commissioner
Israel Gonzalez Jr.
At-Large
Email: igonzalez@weslacotx.gov



Commissioner
Josh Pedraza
District 1
Email: josh.pedraza@weslacotx.gov



Commissioner
Letty Lopez

Additional Information

Special meetings or workshops may be
called by the City Commission
as needed.
For further information
contact us at 956-968-3181.

Regular Meetings

5:30 p.m.
1st and 3rd Tuesday of each month
